comment.author: 83025347@N00
comment._content: A figure in the first Republic of China and the Wuchang uprising, he was assassinated in Canada on his way back from a fund raising trip to the US. in 1918. There's a bit of info here: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baohuang_Hui Usually spelled Tang Hualong.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Faint 1913 date is inscribed in reverse on the negative.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Jim Rees and Wystan: Thanks for the information! By searching the name as "Tang Hualong," I found a bit more biographical information here: http://rulers.org/indext1.html. By flipping the date in image software, it appears to be 9/11/13. We'll add the information when we update the source record.

comment._content: LOC -- I believe that is a 7, not a 9.
